item.title: Descending Dudes - Postgraduate 3D Team Project
item.description: This project was created for my University team project, and is a 3D platformer game, in which the player has to reach the end of an obstacle course and achieve the fastest time they can. We created the game as a team of a few students working as a ‘Mini-Studio’ at Newcastle University. Our project was created using our own engine in C++, and was based on the ‘Goat Heist’ game I created as a previous coursework project; We expanded the codebase significantly, to add a wider range of features to a new game in the engine.
